name: Orbit Shooter
description:
Liluo Link 

NOTE: Just the "Gravitas" and "Ghost" enemies are playable. The ghost enemies unlocks once you beat the other one. This was not clear in the build but I have no more time to make it clearer :P

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It's been many years since the last time I used Gdevelop and wanted to revisit it during this jam.

The idea of a shooter for mobile devices where you orbit around your enemy is one that have been floating in my head for some time now. This is a very barebones prototype of it. I'll look forward to your comments  and I'll probably continue it's development since I discovered a many gameplay opportunities.
